title: M5: Globe material toggle
description: Update GlobeMesh to support switching between dark wireframe material and satellite texture material.

title: M5: Wire toggle to scene
description: Connect satellite view toggle to GlobeCanvas/GlobeMesh rendering path and persist preference in store.

title: M5: Add satellite texture asset pipeline
description: Identify and add satellite imagery source(s), document licensing, and wire loader for use as globe texture.

title: M5: UI toggle for satellite view
description: Add a toggle to LayerToggles and store state for satellite view on/off.
